title: Recognizing workplace emotional labor
content:
Scenario: Recognizing workplace emotional labor
    Given Aisha performs emotional labor at work
    And emotional labor is typically unrecognized
    When the workplace_elohim tracks her contributions
    Then emotional labor should be valued explicitly
    And relationship maintenance, conflict resolution, and care for colleagues should count
    And the full scope of her work should be visible
    And invisible emotional work should be recognized
    And workplace care economy should value all forms of labor
    And she should understand emotional labor as legitimate work
